original_text: But the man who was wronging his neighbor thrust him aside, saying, ‘Who made you a ruler and a judge over us?
korean_text: 그 동무를 해치는 사람이 모세를 밀어뜨려 이르되 누가 너를 관리와 재판장으로 우리 위에 세웠느냐

sentences.original_text: But the man who was wronging his neighbor
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 자기 이웃을 해치던 그 사람은

sentences.original_text: ‘Who made you a ruler and a judge over us?
